label: Output directory
help: Path where your set will be created (exodos collection will be left untouched)

label: Custom Selection
help: Path to your custom selection file

label: Load
help: Load your custom selection from file

label: Save
help: Save your custom selection to file

label: Use genre subfolders
help: Check to use genre subfolders for converted games

label: Long Folder Names
help: Allow long Folder Names ["Long Game Name (YEAR).pc" not "LongGame.pc"] (Batocera/RetroBat Only)#nWill not Rename Existing Folders!

label: Download on demand
help: Activate direct download on demand (only for eXoDOS)

label: Pre-extract Games
help: Pre-Extract Games (MiSTeR and DOS Native only)

label: Rezip for dosbox-pure
help: ReZip games for dosbox pure (Batocera and Retrobat only)

label: Debug Mode
help: in debug mode, pause instruction will be added and [autoexec] part left commented in dosbox.cfg

label: Select all
help: Add all games to your selection

label: Unselect all
help: Remove all games from your selection

label: Collection Games
help: Full list of this Collection games

label: Verify
help: Check that your paths are okay

label: Confirm
help: Your output dir is {outputDir}#nIts content will be erased.#nIf you don't want to proceed, close this window, or click Cancel
